name: Patagonian Steppe Photography Tour
description: Bariloche is the most important tourist destination in Argentina’s Patagonia region, within and around it you can find a variety of landscapes that show different faces and colors each season, including the magical Patagonian Andean forest (a type of temperate to cold forest), vast and crystal-clear lakes, imposing mountains which allow winter sports and summer treks and hikes, challenging natural climbing walls and main destination of this triip, the inhospitable yet breath-taking Patagonian steppe (a cold desert and the largest in Argentina).
